    • setTextDirection

      public PrecomputedText.Params.Builder setTextDirection(@NonNull TextDirectionHeuristic textDir)
      Set the text direction heuristic.

      The default value is TextDirectionHeuristics.FIRSTSTRONG_LTR.

      Parameters:
      textDir - the text direction heuristic for resolving bidi behavior
      Returns:
      this builder, useful for chaining
      See Also:
      • StaticLayout.Builder.setTextDirection(icyllis.modernui.text.TextDirectionHeuristic)
